job_tasks.phrase: Architect and develop AI-driven solutions, focusing on practical, real-world applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation and implementation of AI solutions, which is a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Rebuild prototypes and extend them to deliver impactful use cases
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working with and enhancing existing AI models or prototypes to create new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, evaluate, and refine LLM outputs using state-of-the-art metrics
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working with LLMs, designing their outputs, and evaluating them, all key components of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: develop cutting-edge tools to empower NVM members with smarter, faster, and more efficient solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the creation of tools and solutions, implying software development to deliver AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and optimize outcomes for precision and reliability
job_tasks.justification: Testing and optimization for precision and reliability are crucial steps in ensuring models perform well in a production-like environment.

job_tasks.phrase: harnessing the power of AI to solve real-world challenges
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the application of AI to address practical problems, indicating an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-driven solutions for the real estate market
job_tasks.justification: This specifies the domain and purpose of the AI solutions, showing alignment with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams during Scrum events
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with other teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Present and demo AI solutions to stakeholders, showcasing innovation and functionality
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the need to communicate and present technical work to non-technical audiences.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams during Scrum events
Present and demo AI solutions to stakeholders, showcasing innovation and functionality
harnessing the power of AI to solve real-world challenges

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLM outputs, designing and refining them, and developing AI-driven tools. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer who builds and deploys applications around generative models.
